# 28. Removing support for Riak CS

**Date:** 2019-08-23

**Optional per env:** _only required on some environments_


## CommCare Version Dependency
This change is not known to be dependent on any particular version of CommCare.


## Change Context
We are removing support for deploying Riak CS clusters in commcare-cloud

## Details
This change will remove all variables and playbooks related to Riak CS from the repository.
CommCare HQ will continue to support Riak CS and all other S3 compliant object storage solutions.

In the future, any Riak CS clusters will need to be managed outside of commcare-cloud.

## Steps to update
No commcare-cloud steps required.
